lines.text: You asked a pretty question; I've given you the ugly answer.
Out of evil cometh good. That is, occasionally.
I do not like the human race / I do not like its silly face / But give me a puppy for a friend / And I'll be faithful to the end.
You have an unfair advantage. You know the way my brain works.
The dark recesses of the female mind? Hm! I can hardly claim to have penetrated that far.
You have much more than that but it is obvious you do not know how to use it.
